chapters.title: Chapter 16: Leavetakings
chapters.info: Laefar, p. 262 (230)—An Ogier from Stedding Shangtai. He and Loial met up while he was in Tear negotiating repairs on some Ogier stonework. Loial is convinced that Laefar will inform his mother of where he is, and she will try to find him and marry him off. From Loial's description, his sense of humor is not agreeable.
